node_info.name: googleCloudStorage
node_info.description: Use the Google Cloud Storage API

generic.label: 15 Google apps you can combine and automate to increase productivity

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: getFilters
properties.description: Only return data if the metageneration value of the Bucket matches the sent value

options.name: ifMetagenerationMatch
options.description: Only return data if the metageneration value of the Bucket matches the sent value

options.name: ifMetagenerationNotMatch
options.description: Only return data if the metageneration value of the Bucket does not match the sent value

options.name: predefinedAcl
options.placeholder: Apply a predefined set of access controls to this bucket

options.name: predefinedDefaultObjectAcl
options.placeholder: Apply a predefined set of default object access controls to this bucket

options.placeholder: Access controls on the Bucket

options.name: billing
options.placeholder: The bucket's billing configuration

options.name: cors
options.placeholder: The bucket's Cross Origin Resource Sharing configuration

options.name: customPlacementConfig
options.placeholder: The configuration for the region(s) for the Bucket

options.name: dataLocations
options.placeholder: The list of individual regions that comprise a dual-region Bucket

options.name: defaultEventBasedHold
options.placeholder: Whether or not to automatically apply an event based hold to new objects

options.name: defaultObjectAcl
options.placeholder: Default Access Controls for new objects when no ACL is provided

options.name: encryption
options.placeholder: Encryption configuration for a bucket

options.name: iamConfiguration
options.placeholder: The bucket's IAM configuration

options.name: labels
options.placeholder: User provided bucket labels, in key/value pairs

options.name: lifecycle
options.placeholder: The bucket's lifecycle configuration

options.name: location
options.placeholder: The location of the bucket

options.name: logging
options.placeholder: The bucket's logging configuration

options.name: retentionPolicy
options.placeholder: The bucket's retention policy

options.name: rpo
options.placeholder: The recovery point objective for the bucket

options.name: storageClass
options.placeholder: The bucket's default storage class for objects that don't define one

options.name: versioning
options.placeholder: The bucket's versioning configuration

options.name: website
options.placeholder: The bucket's website configuration for when it is used to host a website

properties.name: alt
properties.placeholder: The type of data to return from the request

properties.name: createFromBinary
properties.description: Whether the data for creating a file should come from a binary field

properties.name: createBinaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be written

properties.name: createContent
properties.description: Content of the file to be uploaded

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.hint: The name of the output binary field to put the file in

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: maxResults
properties.description: Max number of results to return

options.name: X-Goog-Encryption-Algorithm
options.placeholder: The encryption algorithm to use, which must be AES256. Use to supply your own key in the request

options.name: X-Goog-Encryption-Key
options.placeholder: Base64 encoded string of your AES256 encryption key

options.name: X-Goog-Encryption-Key-Sha256
options.placeholder: Base64 encoded string of the SHA256 hash of your encryption key

options.name: delimiter
options.placeholder: Returns results in directory-like mode, using this value as the delimiter

options.name: endOffset
options.placeholder: Filter results to names lexicographically before this value

options.name: includeTrailingDelimiter
options.placeholder: If true, objects will appear with exactly one instance of delimiter at the end of the name

options.name: prefix
options.placeholder: Filter results to names that start with this value

options.name: startOffset
options.placeholder: Filter results to names lexicographically equal or after this value

options.name: versions
options.placeholder: If true, list all versions of objects as distinct entries

properties.name: generation
properties.placeholder: Select a specific revision of the chosen object

properties.name: ifGenerationMatch
properties.placeholder: Make operation conditional of the object generation matching this value

properties.name: ifGenerationNotMatch
properties.placeholder: Make operation conditional of the object generation not matching this value

properties.name: ifMetagenerationMatch
properties.placeholder: Make operation conditional of the object's current metageneration matching this value

properties.name: ifMetagenerationNotMatch
properties.placeholder: Make operation conditional of the object's current metageneration not matching this value

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
